attributes.action: allow people of Ginger Coloured hair more equal rights and opportunities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that people who's hair both facial and bodily comes under the description Ginger are discriminated against in the work place and education through the number of inappropriate jokes and remarks which they most cruelly become the target of based completely on their genetics. we wish to abolish this cruelty
